title: blucepheus
author: blucepheus
created_time: July 29, 2022, 05:55:22 PMLast edit: August 01, 2022, 09:13:27 PM by blucepheus
content: ***UPDATE TO QTY AVAILABLE AND PRICE***I have a 2 BTC silver Casascius (all-silver) in visually excellent condition that I am willing to sell. Coin has not yet been graded but expected to grade very high. I am the second owner. The original owner purchased a roll of these from Mike Caldwell. It was moved from the roll to an Airtite capsule and has remained there since.Asking 1.7 BTCPick up in Texas, escrow through MJ (if desired), shipping USPS Express or Registered mail at buyer's risk and expense.Photos available to serious buyers upon request.
